Package org.wildfly.security.authz

Class MapAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.authz.MapAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attributes
    public class MapAttributes
extends Object
implements Attributes
    A map-backed attributes collection.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd

        Specified by:
        remove in interface Attributes
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        idx - the index
        value - the expected previous mapping value
        Returns:
        true if the value matched and was removed, false otherwise
